Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs) can convert solid carbon directly to electricity via electrochemical oxidation and require less investment compared to other liquid or gas-fed fuel cells.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Anode characteristic is one of the important factors in achieving efficient and stable operation of DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, we have successfully designed and developed 2D multi-physics field models for DC-SOFCs with finger-like nickel-based anode (Cell-A) and traditional nickel-based anode (Cell-B), respectively.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Simulation results revealed that the cell performance was significantly enhanced with increases in the anode porosity and decreases in the distance of carbon fuel to porous anode.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: More importantly, the anode featuring a finger-like pore structure assumed a pivotal role in cell performance.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Specifically, Cell-A exhibited higher electrochemical performance compared to Cell-B due to the lower resistance for gas transport and more abundant amount of three-phase boundaries for electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experimental results verified the simulation findings by making and operating these two DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fabricated Cell-A with finger-like anode delivered higher power output of 858 and 371 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C when fueled with hydrogen and activated carbon, respectively, relative to Cell-B with traditional anode.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The beneficial characteristic of finger-like anode was further demonstrated by the ability of Cell-A to retain stable operation for 14.1 h at 100 mA with the fuel utilization of 15.8% at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study provides important guidance for the design and improvement of DC-SOFCs, and promotes the sustainable utilization of carbon resources.
Titulo: Simulation-guided design of a finger-like nickel-based anode for enhanced performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells
